onChange.script:
root = self.getChild("root")
	
	emvCurrentDate = root.getChild("CurrentDate_EmbeddedView")
	
	facilityId = currentValue.value
		
	dateIn = root.getAsClientTime(system.date.now())
	emvCurrentDate.props.params.Info = 'Room Availability' #system.date.format(dateIn,"MMM d, yyyy h:mm a")
	
	root.setShelterInfo(facilityId)
	
	payload = {'dateIn': dateIn, 'facilityId':facilityId}
	system.perspective.sendMessage('mhSetPrevAvailability',payload)

	root.setReservedInfo(dateIn, facilityId)
	root.setOccupiedInfo(dateIn, facilityId)

customMethods.name: XsetReservedInfo
customMethods.script:
flrReserved = self.getChild("Reserved_FlexRepeater")
	emvRepeaterHeader = self.getChild("RepeaterHeader_EmbeddedView_0")
	#flrReserved.meta.visible = False
	
	startDate = dateIn
	endDate = dateIn
	
	try:
		facilityId = long(facilityId)
	except:
		raise 
	else:

		queryReservedInfo = """
		DECLARE @StartInterval date = ?   
		DECLARE @EndInterval date = ?
		
		SELECT  [Reservation].[reservationStart] 
			,[Reservation].[reservationEnd]
			,CONCAT_WS(' ',[Human].[firstName],[Human].[middleName],[Human].[lastName]) AS participantName
			,[Reservation].participantId
		FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[Reservation] 
			INNER JOIN [RITIOps].[participant].[Participant] ON [Participant].[id] = [Reservation].[participantId] 
			INNER JOIN [RITIOps].[humans].[Human] ON [Participant].[humanId] = [Human].[id] 
			INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Bed] ON [Reservation].[bedId] = [Bed].[id]
			INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Room] ON [Bed].[roomId] = [Room].[id]
			
		WHERE ([Reservation].[timeRetired] IS NULL
			AND [Reservation].[reservationStart] IS NOT NULL    
			AND CAST([Reservation].[reservationStart] AS date) <= @EndInterval
			AND CAST(ISNULL([Reservation].[reservationEnd],@EndInterval) AS date) >= @StartInterval
			AND [Room].[facilityId] = ?) 
		
		ORDER BY [Reservation].[reservationStart]"""
		
		result = system.db.runPrepQuery(queryReservedInfo,[startDate,endDate, facilityId],'RITIOps')
		self.view.custom.reservedInfo = result
		
		auxList = []
		for item in system.dataset.toPyDataSet(result):
			auxDict = {}
			try:
				auxDict['startDate'] = system.date.format(item['reservationStart'])
			except:
				auxDict['startDate'] = None
				
			try:
				auxDict['endDate'] = system.date.format(item['reservationEnd'])
			except:
				auxDict['endDate'] = None				
	
			auxDict['participantName'] = item['participantName']
			auxDict['instanceStyle'] = {} 
			auxDict['instanceStyle']['classes'] = ''
			auxDict['instancePosition'] = {} 
			auxList.append(auxDict)
	
	
		flrReserved.props.instances = auxList
		#flrReserved.meta.visible = True
		
		emvRepeaterHeader.meta.visible = False if len(auxList) == 0 else True

customMethods.name: XsetOccupiedInfo
customMethods.script:
flrOccupied = self.getChild("Occupied_FlexRepeater")
	emvRepeaterHeader = self.getChild("RepeaterHeader_EmbeddedView_1")
	
	try:
		facilityId = long(facilityId)
	except:
		raise 
	else:
		startDate = dateIn
		endDate = dateIn
	
		queryOccupiedInfo = """
		DECLARE @StartInterval date = ?
		DECLARE @EndInterval date = ?
				
		SELECT eventStart
			,eventEnd
			,CONCAT_WS(' ',[Human].[firstName],[Human].[middleName],[Human].[lastName]) AS participantName
			,[BedLog].participantId  
		FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[BedLog]  
			INNER JOIN [RITIOps].[participant].[Participant] ON [Participant].[id] = [BedLog].[participantId] 
			INNER JOIN [RITIOps].[humans].[Human] ON [Participant].[humanId] = [Human].[id]
			INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Bed] ON [BedLog].[bedId] = [Bed].[id]
			INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Room] ON [Bed].[roomId] = [Room].[id] 
		WHERE ([BedLog].[eventStart] IS NOT NULL    
		AND CAST([BedLog].[eventStart] AS date) <= @EndInterval
		AND CAST(ISNULL([BedLog].[eventEnd],@EndInterval) AS date) >= @StartInterval
		AND [Room].[facilityId] = ?) 
		
		ORDER BY [BedLog].[eventStart]"""
		
		result = system.db.runPrepQuery(queryOccupiedInfo,[startDate,endDate, facilityId],'RITIOps')
		self.view.custom.occupiedInfo = result
		
		
		auxList = []
		for item in system.dataset.toPyDataSet(result):
			auxDict = {}
			try:
				auxDict['startDate'] = system.date.format(item['eventStart'])
			except:
				auxDict['startDate'] = None
				
			try:
				auxDict['endDate'] = system.date.format(item['eventEnd'])
			except:
				auxDict['endDate'] = None				
	
			auxDict['participantName'] = item['participantName']
			auxDict['instanceStyle'] = {} 
			auxDict['instanceStyle']['classes'] = ''
			auxDict['instancePosition'] = {} 
			auxList.append(auxDict)
	
		flrOccupied.props.instances = auxList
		
		emvRepeaterHeader.meta.visible = False if len(auxList) == 0 else True
		
		setOccupiedInfo
		
		dateIn, facilityId

customMethods.name: setShelterInfo
setReservedInfo
customMethods.script:
flex = self.getChild("FlexContainer")
	flrReserved = flex.getChild("Reserved_FlexRepeater")
	emvRepeaterHeader = flex.getChild("RepeaterHeader_EmbeddedView_0")
	#flrReserved.meta.visible = False

	startDate = dateIn
	endDate = dateIn

	facilityId = long(facilityId)

	# Note: query result is sorted by name extracted from bedName (bedNameNo)
	queryReservedInfo = """
	DECLARE @StartInterval date = ?   
	DECLARE @EndInterval date = ?
			
	SELECT  CONCAT_WS(' ',[Human].[firstName],[Human].[middleName],[Human].[lastName]) AS participantName
		,[Reservation].[reservationEnd]
		,[Room].[roomName]
		,[Bed].[bedName]
		,ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(int, SUBSTRING([bedName], PATINDEX('%[0-9]%', [bedName]), LEN([bedName]))),-1) bedNameNo
	FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[Reservation] 
		INNER JOIN [RITIOps].[participant].[Participant] ON [Participant].[id] = [Reservation].[participantId] 
		INNER JOIN [RITIOps].[humans].[Human] ON [Participant].[humanId] = [Human].[id] 
		INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Bed] ON [Reservation].[bedId] = [Bed].[id]
		INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Room] ON [Bed].[roomId] = [Room].[id]
				
	WHERE ([Reservation].[timeRetired] IS NULL
		AND [Reservation].[reservationStart] IS NOT NULL    
		AND CAST([Reservation].[reservationStart] AS date) <= @EndInterval
		AND CAST(ISNULL([Reservation].[reservationEnd],@EndInterval) AS date) >= @StartInterval
		AND [Room].[facilityId] = ?) 
			
	ORDER BY [Room].[roomName], ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(int, SUBSTRING([bedName], PATINDEX('%[0-9]%', [bedName]), LEN([bedName]))),-1)"""
	
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(queryReservedInfo,[startDate,endDate, facilityId],'RITIOps')
	self.view.custom.reservedInfo = result
	
	auxList = []
	for item in system.dataset.toPyDataSet(result):
		
		auxDict = {}
		auxDict['info1'] = item['participantName']
		auxDict['info2'] = system.date.format(item['reservationEnd'],"MMM d, yyyy") if item['reservationEnd'] is not None else '-'
		auxDict['info3'] = item['roomName']
		auxDict['info4'] = item['bedName']
		
		auxDict['instanceStyle'] = {} 
		auxDict['instanceStyle']['classes'] = ''
		auxDict['instancePosition'] = {} 
		auxList.append(auxDict)


	flrReserved.props.instances = auxList
	#flrReserved.meta.visible = True
	
	emvRepeaterHeader.meta.visible = False if len(auxList) == 0 else True

customMethods.name: setOccupiedInfo
customMethods.script:
flex = self.getChild("FlexContainer")
	flrOccupied = flex.getChild("Occupied_FlexRepeater")
	emvRepeaterHeader = flex.getChild("RepeaterHeader_EmbeddedView_1")

	facilityId = long(facilityId)

	startDate = dateIn
	endDate = dateIn
	
	# Note: query result is sorted by name extracted from bedName (bedNameNo)
	queryOccupiedInfo = """
	DECLARE @StartInterval date = ?
	DECLARE @EndInterval date = ?
			
	SELECT CONCAT_WS(' ',[Human].[firstName],[Human].[middleName],[Human].[lastName]) AS participantName
			,eventStart
			,[Room].[roomName]
			,[Bed].[bedName]
			,ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(int, SUBSTRING([bedName], PATINDEX('%[0-9]%', [bedName]), LEN([bedName]))),-1) bedNameNo
	FROM [RitiOps].[lodging].[BedLog]  
		INNER JOIN [RITIOps].[participant].[Participant] ON [Participant].[id] = [BedLog].[participantId] 
		INNER JOIN [RITIOps].[humans].[Human] ON [Participant].[humanId] = [Human].[id]
		INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Bed] ON [BedLog].[bedId] = [Bed].[id]
		INNER JOIN [RitiOps].[lodging].[Room] ON [Bed].[roomId] = [Room].[id] 
	WHERE ([BedLog].[eventStart] IS NOT NULL    
	AND CAST([BedLog].[eventStart] AS date) <= @EndInterval
	AND CAST(ISNULL([BedLog].[eventEnd],@EndInterval) AS date) >= @StartInterval
	AND [Room].[facilityId] = ?) 
	
	ORDER BY [Room].[roomName], ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(int, SUBSTRING([bedName], PATINDEX('%[0-9]%', [bedName]), LEN([bedName]))),-1)"""
	
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(queryOccupiedInfo,[startDate,endDate, facilityId],'RITIOps')
	self.view.custom.occupiedInfo = result
	
	
	auxList = []
	for item in system.dataset.toPyDataSet(result):

		auxDict = {}
		auxDict['info1'] = item['participantName']
		auxDict['info2'] = system.date.format(item['eventStart'],"MMM d, yyyy") if item['eventStart'] is not None else '-'
		auxDict['info3'] = item['roomName']
		auxDict['info4'] = item['bedName']

		auxDict['instanceStyle'] = {} 
		auxDict['instanceStyle']['classes'] = ''
		auxDict['instancePosition'] = {} 
		auxList.append(auxDict)

	flrOccupied.props.instances = auxList
	
	emvRepeaterHeader.meta.visible = False if len(auxList) == 0 else True
